snippet.title: The Little Tales Of Alexandria -Trailer-
snippet.description:
The Little Tales Of Alexandria is a retro short story driven exploration game for Gameboy and Analogue pocket. Staging inside the apartment block Alexandria, featuring 15 plus different apartments all with their own tale to tell.

Game Store Page: https://authormre.itch.io/the-little-tales-of-alexandria
Cartridge: https://shop.insidegadgets.com/product/the-little-tales-of-alexandria/

Special thanks to Archades Games!
Check him out! https://www.youtube.com/c/IceStrike256

Follow me for the latest updates! 👾

Email: AuthorMrE@email.com 📧
Twitter: @authormre 🦜
SoundCloud: https://on.soundcloud.com/xzgFM
